summary: Contoso Wireless offers a product streaming service for $19.99 per month with a 10% discount for customers who sign up for a 12-month contract. There is an activation fee of $49.99 and taxes and fees that vary by state. Payment can be made via credit card, PayPal or Apple Pay. The service includes features such as high-definition streaming, cloud storage, and exclusive access to new releases. Customers have access to 24/7 customer service and a 30-day money back guarantee if they are not satisfied with the service.
